name: MAIN_BLOCK
code:
DATA lt_konv TYPE TABLE OF konv.
DATA ls_konv TYPE konv.
DATA lt_prcd TYPE TABLE OF prcd_elements.
DATA ls_prcd TYPE prcd_elements.
DATA lv_cnt TYPE dzaehk.
DATA lv_head TYPE dzaehko.
DATA lv_cnt_ok TYPE vfprc_cond_count.
DATA lv_head_ok TYPE vfprc_cond_count_head.
SELECT * FROM konv INTO TABLE lt_konv.
SELECT * FROM prcd_elements INTO TABLE lt_prcd.
UPDATE konv SET kbetr = kbetr WHERE knumv = '0000000001'.
INSERT konv FROM ls_konv.
DELETE FROM konv WHERE knumv = '0000000002'.
